trans-unit.source: For a 2x2 table this is equivalent to McNemar’s test. More generally the procedure tests the null hypothesis that the marginal distribution of the row factor is equal to the marginal distribution of the column factor. For this to be meaningful, the two factors must have the same sample space (i.e. the same categories).
trans-unit.target: 对于2x2的桌子，这相当于McNemar的测试。更一般地，该过程检验行假设的边际分布等于列因素的边际分布的零假设。为了使这一点有意义，两个因素必须具有相同的样本空间（即相同的类别）。

trans-unit.source: For example, it may be that INVERT_UNIVARIATE and SOLVE_CHOLESKY are indicated (this is in fact the default case). In this case, if the endogenous vector is 1-dimensional (k_endog = 1), then INVERT_UNIVARIATE is used and inversion reduces to simple division, and if it has a larger dimension, the Cholesky decomposition along with linear solving (rather than explicit matrix inversion) is used. If only SOLVE_CHOLESKY had been set, then the Cholesky decomposition method would always be used, even in the case of 1-dimensional data.
trans-unit.target: 例如，可能指示了INVERT_UNIVARIATE和SOLVE_CHOLESKY（实际上这是默认情况）。在这种情况下，如果内生向量为一维（ k_endog = 1），则使用INVERT_UNIVARIATE并将反演简化为简单除法；如果维数较大，则将Cholesky分解与线性求解一起使用（而不是显式矩阵反演） ） 用来。如果仅设置了SOLVE_CHOLESKY，则即使在一维数据的情况下，也将始终使用Cholesky分解方法。

trans-unit.source: For normality: ‘table’ uses the table from Dalal and Wilkinson, which is available for pvalues between 0.001 and 0.2, and the formula of Lilliefors for large n (n>900). Values in the table are linearly interpolated. Values outside the range will be returned as bounds, 0.2 for large and 0.001 for small pvalues. For exponential: ‘table’ uses the table from Lilliefors 1967, available for pvalues between 0.01 and 0.2. Values outside the range will be returned as bounds, 0.2 for large and 0.01 for small pvalues.
trans-unit.target: 对于正态性：“表”使用Dalal和Wilkinson的表（适用于0.001至0.2的p值）以及大n（n> 900）的Lilliefors公式。表中的值是线性插值的。超出范围的值将作为边界返回，大pvalue的值为0.2，小pvalue的值为0.001。对于指数：“表”使用Lilliefors 1967中的表，可用于0.01到0.2之间的p值。超出范围的值将作为边界返回，大pvalue的值为0.2，小pvalue的值为0.01。

trans-unit.source: For these test the null hypothesis is that all observations have the same error variance, i.e. errors are homoscedastic. trans-unit.target: 对于这些检验,零假设是所有的观测值具有相同的误差方差,即误差是同序性的。这些检验的不同之处在于哪种异方差被认为是备选假设。它们对不同类型的异方差性的检验能力也不同。

trans-unit.target: 对于未观察到的成分模型,特别是在按照引言中的第(2)点探索风格化的事实时,绘制估计的未观察到的成分(如水平、趋势和周期)本身,看看它们是否提供了对数据的有意义的描述,往往更有指导意义。

trans-unit.source: From an Q x P contrast matrix C and an N x P design matrix D, checks if the contrast C is estimable by looking at the rank of vstack([C,D]) and verifying it is the same as the rank of D.
trans-unit.target: 从Q x P对比度矩阵 C 和N x P设计矩阵 D 中，通过查看 vstack([C,D]) 的等级并验证其与 D 的等级相同，来检查对比度 C 是否可估计。

trans-unit.source: From examples it looks like there is little power for standard cusum if exog (other than constant) have mean zero.
trans-unit.target: 从例子来看,如果exog(除常数外)的均值为0,那么标准cusum的力量就很小。

trans-unit.source: From our first look at the data, the difference between Master's and PhD in the management group is different than in the non-management group. This is an interaction between the two qualitative variables management,M and education,E. We can visualize this by first removing the effect of experience, then plotting the means within each of the 6 groups using interaction.plot.
trans-unit.target: 从我们第一次看数据来看,管理组的硕士和博士与非管理组的差异是不同的。这是两个定性变量management,M和education,E之间的交互作用。我们可以通过先去掉经验的影响,然后用interactive.plot绘制6个组内的均值来可视化。

trans-unit.source: From the estimated VAR model, we can plot the impulse response functions of the endogenous variables.
trans-unit.target: 从估计的VAR模型,我们可以绘制内生变量的脉冲响应函数。

trans-unit.source: From the estimated transition matrix we can calculate the expected duration of a low regime versus a high regime.
trans-unit.target: 从估计的过渡矩阵中,我们可以计算出低制度与高制度的预期持续时间。

trans-unit.source: From the estimated transition matrix we can calculate the expected duration of a recession versus an expansion.
trans-unit.target: 根据估计的过渡矩阵,我们可以计算出经济衰退与经济扩张的预期持续时间。

trans-unit.source: From the first two graphs, we note that the original time series does not appear to be stationary, whereas the first-difference does. This supports either estimating an ARMA model on the first-difference of the data, or estimating an ARIMA model with 1 order of integration (recall that we are taking the latter approach). The last two graphs support the use of an ARMA(1,1,1) model.
trans-unit.target: 从前两张图中,我们注意到,原始时间序列似乎并不稳定,而第一差值却很稳定。这支持对数据的第一差值估计ARMA模型,或者估计1阶积分的ARIMA模型(记得我们采取的是后一种方法)。最后两张图支持使用ARMA(1,1,1)模型。

trans-unit.source: From the summary output, the mean federal funds rate in the first regime (the "low regime") is estimated to be $3.7$ whereas in the "high regime" it is $9.6$. Below we plot the smoothed probabilities of being in the high regime. The model suggests that the 1980's was a time-period in which a high federal funds rate existed.
trans-unit.target: 从摘要输出来看,第一种制度("低制度")的平均联邦基金利率估计为3.7美元,而 "高制度 "的平均联邦基金利率为9.6美元。下面我们绘制了处于高制度的平滑概率。该模型表明,20世纪80年代是一个存在高联邦基金利率的时间段。

trans-unit.source: Generalized Linear Mixed Effects (GLIMMIX) models are generalized linear models with random effects in the linear predictors. Statsmodels currently supports estimation of binomial and Poisson GLIMMIX models using two Bayesian methods: the Laplace approximation to the posterior, and a variational Bayes approximation to the posterior. Both methods provide point estimates (posterior means) and assessments of uncertainty (posterior standard deviation).
trans-unit.target: 广义线性混合效应(GLIMMIX)模型是在线性预测因子中带有随机效应的广义线性模型。Statsmodels目前支持使用两种贝叶斯方法估计二项式和泊松GLIMMIX模型:后验的Laplace近似和后验的变量贝叶斯近似。这两种方法都提供点估计(后验平均值)和不确定性评估(后验标准差)。

trans-unit.source: Here we demonstrate another feature of model fitting - the use of a random search for MLE starting parameters. Because Markov switching models are often characterized by many local maxima of the likelihood function, performing an initial optimization step can be helpful to find the best parameters.
trans-unit.target: 这里我们演示了模型拟合的另一个特点--使用随机搜索MLE起始参数。由于马尔科夫开关模型的特征往往是似然函数的许多局部最大值,所以执行初始优化步骤可以帮助找到最佳参数。

trans-unit.source: Here we used reference=0, which implies that the first level, Hispanic, is the reference category against which the other level effects are measured. As mentioned above, the columns do not sum to zero and are thus not independent of the intercept. To be explicit, let’s look at how this would encode the race variable.
trans-unit.target: 在这里，我们使用 reference=0 ，这意味着第一个级别（西班牙裔）是衡量其他级别影响的参考类别。如上所述，这些列的总和不为零，因此与截距无关。明确地说，让我们看一下如何编码 race 变量。

trans-unit.source: Here we used reference=0, which implies that the first level, Hispanic, is the reference category against which the other level effects are measured. trans-unit.source: Here, \(Y_{ijk}\) is the \(k`th measured response under conditions :math:`i, j\). The only “mean structure parameter” is \(\beta_0\). The \(\eta_{1i}\) are independent and identically distributed with zero mean, and variance \(\tau_1^2\), and the \(\eta_{2j}\) are independent and identically distributed with zero mean, and variance \(\tau_2^2\).
trans-unit.target: 在这里，\（Y_ {ijk} \）是\（在条件i，j \下的第k个测得的响应）。唯一的“平均结构参数”是\（\ beta_0 \）。 \（\ eta_ {1i} \）是独立且均等的，均值为零；方差\（\ tau_1 ^ 2 \）和\（\ eta_ {2j} \）是独立且均等的，均值为零，和方差\（\ tau_2 ^ 2 \）。

trans-unit.source: Here, \(Y_{ij}\) is the \(j`th measured response for subject :math:`i\), and \(X_{ij}\) is a covariate for this response. The “fixed effects parameters” \(\beta_0\) and \(\beta_1\) are shared by all subjects, and the errors \(\epsilon_{ij}\) are independent of everything else, and identically distributed (with mean zero). The “random effects parameters” \(gamma_{0i}\) and \(gamma_{1i}\) follow a bivariate distribution with mean zero, described by three parameters: \({\rm var}\gamma_{0i}\), \({\rm var}\gamma_{1i}\), and \({\rm cov}(\gamma_{0i}, \gamma_{1i})\). There is also a parameter for \({\rm var}(\epsilon_{ij})\).
trans-unit.target: 这里，\（Y_ {ij} \）是\（第i个对主题：math：`i \）的测量响应，而\（X_ {ij} \）是该响应的协变量。“固定效果参数” \（\ beta_0 \）和\（\ beta_1 \）被所有对象共享，并且误差\（\ epsilon_ {ij} \）与其他所有东西无关，并且分布相同（均值为零）。“随机效应参数” \（gamma_ {0i} \）和\（gamma_ {1i} \）遵循均值为零的双变量分布，由三个参数来描述：\（{\ rm var} \ gamma_ {0i} \） ，\（{\ rm var} \ gamma_ {1i} \）和\（{\ rm cov}（\ gamma_ {0i}，\ gamma_ {1i}）\）。还有一个用于\（{\ rm var}（\ epsilon_ {ij}）\）的参数。

However, to have a statistical model we need additional assumptions on the properties of the explanatory variables, x, and the noise. One standard assumption for many basic models is that x is not correlated with the noise. In a more general definition, x being exogenous means that we do not have to consider how the explanatory variables in x were generated, whether by design or by random draws from some underlying distribution, when we want to estimate the effect or impact that x has on y, or test a hypothesis about this effect.
trans-unit.target: 然而,为了拥有一个统计模型,我们需要对解释变量、x和噪声的属性进行额外的假设。许多基本模型的一个标准假设是x与噪声不相关。在一个更一般的定义中,x是外生的,意味着当我们要估计x对y的影响或影响,或者检验关于这个影响的假设时,我们不必考虑x中的解释变量是如何产生的,是通过设计还是从某个基本分布中随机抽取的。

trans-unit.source: If exog is None, the standard Kaplan-Meier estimator is used. If exog is not None, a local estimate of the marginal survival function around each point is constructed, and these are then averaged. This procedure gives an estimate of the marginal survival function that accounts for dependent censoring as long as the censoring becomes independent when conditioning on the covariates in exog. See Zeng et al. (2004) for details.
trans-unit.target: 如果exog为无,则使用标准的Kaplan-Meier估计器。如果exog不是None,则构建每个点周围的边际生存函数的局部估计,然后对这些估计进行平均。这个过程给出了一个边际生存函数的估计值,只要在对exog中的协变量进行调节时,删减变得独立,就可以考虑到依赖性删减。详见Zeng等人(2004)。

trans-unit.source: If f returns a 1d array, it returns a Jacobian. If a 2d array is returned by f (e.g., with a value for each observation), it returns a 3d array with the Jacobian of each observation with shape xk x nobs x xk. I.e., the Jacobian of the first observation would be [:, 0, :]

trans-unit.source: If fit by ‘mle’, it is assumed for the Kalman Filter that the initial unkown state is zero, and that the inital variance is P = dot(inv(identity(m**2)-kron(T,T)),dot(R,R.T).ravel(‘F’)).reshape(r, r, order = ‘F’)
trans-unit.target: 如果用'mle'拟合，则对于卡尔曼滤波器，假定初始未知状态为零，并且初始方差为P =点（inv（identity（m ** 2）-kron（T，T））， dot（R，RT）.ravel（'F'））。reshape（r，r，order ='F'）

trans-unit.source: If it > 1, then further weighted local linear regressions are performed, where the weights are the same as above times the _lowess_bisquare function of the residuals. Each iteration takes approximately the same amount of time as the original fit, so these iterations are expensive. They are most useful when the noise has extremely heavy tails, such as Cauchy noise. Noise with less heavy-tails, such as t-distributions with df>2, are less problematic. The weights downgrade the influence of points with large residuals. In the extreme case, points whose residuals are larger than 6 times the median absolute residual are given weight 0.
trans-unit.target: 如果> 1，则执行进一步的加权局部线性回归，其中权重与残差的_lowess_bisquare函数的乘积相同。每次迭代花费的时间与原始拟合大约相同，因此这些迭代非常昂贵。当噪声的尾巴非常重时，例如柯西噪声，它们最有用。重尾较少的噪声（例如df> 2的t分布）的问题较少。权重会降低残差较大的点的影响。在极端情况下，其残差大于绝对绝对中位数的6倍的点的权重为0。

trans-unit.source: If it is fit by MLE then the (exact) unconditional maximum likelihood is returned.
trans-unit.target: 如果它是由MLE拟合的,那么将返回(精确的)无条件最大似然。

trans-unit.source: If keyword arguments are used to set individual boolean flags, then the lowercase of the method must be used as an argument name, and the value is the desired value of the boolean flag (True or False).
trans-unit.target: 如果使用关键字参数来设置各个布尔标志,那么必须使用方法的小写作为参数名,值是布尔标志的期望值(True或False)。

trans-unit.source: If method is ‘IRLS’, then an additional keyword ‘attach_wls’ is available. This is currently for internal use only and might change in future versions. If attach_wls’ is true, then the final WLS instance of the IRLS iteration is attached to the results instance as results_wls attribute.
trans-unit.target: 如果method为“ IRLS”，则可以使用其他关键字“ attach_wls”。当前仅内部使用，在将来的版本中可能会更改。如果attach_wls'为true，则IRLS迭代的最终WLS实例将作为 results_wls 属性附加到结果实例。

trans-unit.source: If method is ‘l1’, then fe_pen and cov_pen are used to obtain the covariance structure, but are ignored during the L1-penalized fitting.
trans-unit.target: 如果method为'l1'，则使用 fe_pen 和 cov_pen 获得协方差结构，但在L1惩罚拟合中将被忽略。

trans-unit.source: If method=’ml’, the factors are rotated to satisfy condition IC3 of Bai and Li (2012). This means that the scores have covariance I, so the model for the covariance matrix is L * L’ + diag(U), where L are the loadings and U are the uniquenesses. In addition, L’ * diag(U)^{-1} L must be diagonal.
trans-unit.target: 如果method ='ml'，则旋转因子以满足Bai and Li（2012）的条件IC3。这意味着得分具有协方差I，因此协方差矩阵的模型为L * L'+ diag（U），其中L是负载，U是唯一性。另外，L'* diag（U）^ {-1} L必须是对角线。

trans-unit.source: If missing_values is True during instantiation of StataReader then observations with _StataMissingValue(s) are not filtered and should be handled by your applcation.
trans-unit.target: 如果在StataReader实例化过程中missing_values为True,那么带有_StataMissingValue(s)的观测值就不会被过滤,应该由你的应用程序来处理。

trans-unit.source: If no argument is specified returns the covariance matrix of a model (scale)*(X.T X)^(-1)
trans-unit.target: 如果未指定任何参数，则返回模型 (scale)*(X.T X)^(-1) 的协方差矩阵

trans-unit.source: If no date / time information is provided, the frequency is constrained to be between zero and \(\pi\), so the period is constrained to be in \([0.5, \infty]\).
trans-unit.target: 如果没有提供日期/时间信息,则频率被限制在零和/(\pi/)之间,因此周期被限制在/([0.5,\infty]\)。

trans-unit.source: If no formula was used, then the provided exog needs to have the same number of columns as the original exog in the model. No transformation of the data is performed except converting it to a numpy array.
trans-unit.target: 如果没有使用公式,那么提供的exog需要与模型中的原始exog具有相同的列数。除了将数据转换为numpy数组外,不对数据进行任何转换。

trans-unit.source: If nothing is known or suspected about the form of E[x1 | x2], set cond_means to None, and it will be estimated by smoothing each non-focus exog against the focus exog. The values of frac control these lowess smooths.
trans-unit.target: 如果对E [x1 | |的形式一无所知 [x2]，将 cond_means 设置为“无”，并且可以通过将每个非焦点exog相对于焦点exog进行平滑来进行估计。 frac 的值控制这些最低的平滑度。

trans-unit.source: If nsides == 2, x is filtered around lag 0
trans-unit.target: 如果nsides==2,则x围绕滞后0进行过滤

trans-unit.source: If num is a time series, then this applies the linear filter den^{-1}. If both num and den are both lag polynomials, then this calculates the quotient polynomial for n terms and also returns the remainder.
trans-unit.target: 如果num是一个时间序列,那么这将应用线性滤波器den^{-1}。如果num和den都是滞后多项式,那么这将计算n项的商多项式,并返回余数。

trans-unit.source: If optimization is still not successful, try changing the values of start_int_params. If the current function value repeatedly jumps from a number between 0 and the critical value and a very large number (>50), the starting parameters of the interior minimization need to be changed.
trans-unit.target: 如果优化仍然没有成功，请尝试更改start_int_params的值。如果当前功能值反复从0到临界值之间的数字跳到非常大的数字（> 50），则需要更改内部最小化的起始参数。

trans-unit.source: If performance is a concern, only those results which are needed should be specified as any results that are not specified will not be calculated. For example, if the smoother output is set to only include SMOOTHER_STATE, the smoother operates much more quickly than if all output is required.
trans-unit.target: 如果担心性能,应该只指定那些需要的结果,因为任何没有指定的结果都不会被计算。例如,如果将平滑器的输出设置为只包括SMOOTHER_STATE,那么平滑器的运行速度要比需要所有输出的情况下快得多。

trans-unit.source: If remove_data is true and the model result does not implement a remove_data method then this will raise an exception.
trans-unit.target: 如果 remove_data 为真,而模型结果没有实现 remove_data 方法,那么这将引发一个异常。

trans-unit.source: If return_results is True (default), then a results instance with all statistics is returned If return_results is False, then only kappa is calculated and returned.
trans-unit.target: 如果return_results为True(默认),则返回一个包含所有统计数据的结果实例 如果return_results为False,则只计算并返回kappa。

trans-unit.source: If sigma is a function of the data making one of the regressors a constant, then the current postestimation statistics will not be correct.
trans-unit.target: 如果sigma是数据的函数,使其中一个回归因子成为常数,那么当前的估计后统计将不正确。

trans-unit.source: If the bitmask is set directly via the conserve_memory argument, then the full method must be provided.
trans-unit.target: 如果直接通过 conserve_memory 参数设置位掩码，则必须提供full方法。

trans-unit.source: If the bitmask is set directly via the filter_method argument, then the full method must be provided.
trans-unit.target: 如果直接通过 filter_method 参数设置位掩码，则必须提供full方法。

trans-unit.source: If the bitmask is set directly via the inversion_method argument, then the full method must be provided.
trans-unit.target: 如果直接通过 inversion_method 参数设置位掩码，则必须提供full方法。

trans-unit.source: If the bitmask is set directly via the smooth_method argument, then the full method must be provided.
trans-unit.target: 如果直接通过 smooth_method 参数设置位掩码，则必须提供full方法。

trans-unit.source: If the bitmask is set directly via the smoother_output argument, then the full method must be provided.
trans-unit.target: 如果直接通过 smoother_output 参数设置位掩码，则必须提供full方法。

trans-unit.source: If the bitmask is set directly via the stability_method argument, then the full method must be provided.
trans-unit.target: 如果位掩码是通过直接设置 stability_method 参数，那么必须提供完整的方法。

trans-unit.source: If the coefficients provided are matrices \((C_0, C_1, \dots, C_n)\), then the corresponding polynomial is \(C_0 + C_1 L + \dots + C_n L^n\).
trans-unit.target: 如果所提供的系数是矩阵((C_0,C_1,\dots,C_n)\),那么相应的多项式就是(C_0+C_1 L+\dots+C_n L^n)。

trans-unit.source: If the coefficients provided are matrices \((C_0, C_1, \dots, C_p)\), each of shape \((m, m)\), then the companion matrix is an \(nm \times nm\) matrix formed with the elements in the first column defined as \(\phi_i = -C_0^{-1} C_i', i \in 1, \dots, p\).
trans-unit.target: 如果所提供的系数是矩阵((C_0,C_1,\dots,C_p)\),每个矩阵的形状是((m,m)\),那么同伴矩阵是由第一列中的元素组成的矩阵(nm \times nm),定义为(\phi_i=-C_0^{-1}C_i',i \in 1,\dots,p)。

trans-unit.source: If the coefficients provided are scalars \((c_0, c_1, \dots, c_n)\), then the corresponding polynomial is \(c_0 + c_1 L + \dots + c_n L^n\).
trans-unit.target: 如果提供的系数是标量((c_0,c_1,\dots,c_n)\),那么对应的多项式就是(c_0+c_1 L+\dots+c_n L^n)。

trans-unit.source: If the coefficients provided are scalars \((c_0, c_1, \dots, c_p)\), then the companion matrix is an \(n \times n\) matrix formed with the elements in the first column defined as \(\phi_i = -\frac{c_i}{c_0}, i \in 1, \dots, p\).
trans-unit.target: 如果所提供的系数是标量((c_0,c_1,\dots,c_p)\),那么伴生矩阵是由第一列中的元素组成的矩阵(n \times n),定义为(\phi_i=-frac{c_i}{c_0},i \in 1,\dots,p)。

trans-unit.source: If the correlation matrix is already positive semi-definite given the threshold, then the original correlation matrix is returned.
trans-unit.target: 如果相关矩阵已经是给定阈值的正半定型,则返回原相关矩阵。

trans-unit.source: If the covariance matrix is singular or not SPD, it is projected to the nearest such matrix. These projection events are recorded in the fit_history member of the GEE model.
trans-unit.target: 如果协方差矩阵是奇异的,或者不是SPD,则将其投影到最接近的矩阵。这些投影事件记录在GEE模型的fit_history成员中。

trans-unit.source: If the cycle is damped (damped_cycle=True), then there is a third parameter to estimate, \(\rho_c\).
trans-unit.target: 如果周期是阻尼的（阻尼的周期 damped_cycle=True ），则有第三个参数来估计\（\ rho_c \）。

trans-unit.source: If the cyclical effect is stochastic (stochastic_cycle=True), then there is another parameter to estimate (the variance of the error term - note that both of the error terms here share the same variance, but are assumed to have independent draws).
trans-unit.target: 如果周期性效应是随机的（ stochastic_cycle=True ），则有另一个参数可以估计（误差项的方差-请注意，这里的两个误差项均具有相同的方差，但假定具有独立的平局）。

trans-unit.source: If the data are jointly Gaussian, the marginal sampling distributions of the elements of the sample correlation matrix are approximately Gaussian with standard deviation 1 / sqrt(n). The default value of minabs is thus equal to 1 standard error, which will set to zero approximately 68% of the estimated correlation coefficients for which the population value is zero.
trans-unit.target: 如果数据是联合高斯，则样本相关矩阵的元素的边际采样分布近似为高斯，标准偏差为1 / sqrt（n）。因此， minabs 的默认值等于1个标准误差，该标准误差将设置为零，而该估计值的总体系数为0时约为相关系数的68％。

trans-unit.source: If the data is 2d, then these are separate confidence intervals for each column.
trans-unit.target: 如果数据是2d,那么这些都是每个列的独立置信区间。

trans-unit.source: If the date / time information is provided, the default bounds allow the cyclical component to be between 1.5 and 12 years; depending on the frequency of the endogenous variable, this will imply different specific bounds.
trans-unit.target: 如果提供了日期/时间信息,默认界限允许周期性成分在1.5年至12年之间;根据内生变量的频率,这将意味着不同的具体界限。

trans-unit.source: If the endogenous time series is univariate, then inversion can be performed by simple division. If this flag is set and the time series is univariate, then division will always be used even if other flags are also set.
trans-unit.target: 如果内生时间序列是单变量的,那么可以通过简单的除法进行反演。如果设置了这个标志,并且时间序列是单变量的,那么即使设置了其他标志,也会使用除法。

trans-unit.source: If the endogenous variable is binary:
trans-unit.target: 如果内生变量是二元的。

trans-unit.source: If the endogenous variable is binomial:
trans-unit.target: 如果内生变量是二项式的。

trans-unit.source: If the filtering method is specified to be univariate, then simple division is always used regardless of the dimension of the endogenous time series.
trans-unit.target: 如果指定滤波方法为单变量,那么无论内生时间序列的维度如何,总是使用简单除法。

trans-unit.source: If the first d loglikelihood values were burned (i.e. in the specified model, loglikelihood_burn=d), then this test is calculated ignoring the first d residuals.
trans-unit.target: 如果燃烧了前 d 个对数似然值（即在指定模型中， loglikelihood_burn=d ），则忽略第一个 d 残差来计算此检验。

trans-unit.source: If the focus variable is believed to be independent of the other exog variables, cond_means can be set to an (empty) nx0 array.
trans-unit.target: 如果认为focus变量独立于其他exog变量， cond_means 可以将cond_means设置为（空）nx0数组。

trans-unit.source: If the function returns optimization failed, consider narrowing the boundaries of the plot
trans-unit.target: 如果函数返回优化失败,可以考虑缩小绘图的边界。

trans-unit.source: If the function returns the error f(a) and f(b) must have different signs, consider lowering lower_bound and raising upper_bound.
trans-unit.target: 如果函数返回的错误f(a)和f(b)必须有不同的符号,可以考虑降低lower_bound,提高 upper_bound。

trans-unit.source: If the input matrix is sparse, then cov - k*I is also sparse, so the eigen-decomposition can be done effciciently using sparse routines.
trans-unit.target: 如果输入矩阵是稀疏的,那么cov-k*I也是稀疏的,所以可以使用稀疏例程有效地进行特征分解。

trans-unit.source: If the lag polynomial has non-consecutive powers (so that the coefficient is zero on some element of the polynomial), then the constraint function is not onto the entire space of invertible polynomials, although it only excludes a very small portion very close to the invertibility boundary.
trans-unit.target: 如果滞后多项式具有非连续的幂(使系数在多项式的某些元素上为零),那么约束函数就不是到整个可倒置多项式的空间,尽管它只排除了非常接近可倒置边界的一小部分。

trans-unit.source: If the link is the identity link function then the loglikelihood function is the same as the classical OLS model.
trans-unit.target: 如果链接是身份链接函数,那么对数似然函数与经典OLS模型相同。

trans-unit.source: If the links is not the identity link then the loglikelihood function is defined as
trans-unit.target: 如果该环节不是身份环节,那么对数似然函数定义为

trans-unit.source: If the list doesn’t include the singletons, then it will be only a partial partition. Missing items are singletons (I think).
trans-unit.target: 如果列表不包括单例，则它将只是部分分区。缺少的项目是单身人士（我认为）。

trans-unit.source: If the model as not yet been fit, params is not optional.
trans-unit.target: 如果模型还没有安装,params不是可选的。

trans-unit.source: If the model has not yet been fit, params is not optional.
trans-unit.target: 如果模型还没有装好,params是不可选择的。

trans-unit.source: If the optimization does not terminate successfully, consider switching optimization algorithms.
trans-unit.target: 如果优化没有成功终止,可以考虑更换优化算法。

trans-unit.source: If the pvalue is smaller than a threshold, say 0.05, then we reject the hypothesis that the difference between the two samples is larger than the the thresholds given by low and upp.
trans-unit.target: 如果p值小于一个阈值,比如说0.05,那么我们拒绝假设,即两个样本之间的差异大于low和upp给出的阈值。

trans-unit.source: If the pvalue is smaller than a threshold, say 0.05, then we reject the hypothesis that the expected value of the sample (mean of the population) is outside of the interval given by thresholds low and upp.
trans-unit.target: 如果p值小于一个阈值,比如说0.05,那么我们就拒绝假设,即样本的期望值(群体的平均值)在阈值low和upp给出的区间之外。

trans-unit.source: If the pvalue is smaller than a threshold,say 0.05, then we reject the hypothesis that the difference between the two samples is larger than the the thresholds given by low and upp.
trans-unit.target: 如果p值小于一个阈值,比如说0.05,那么我们就拒绝假设两个样本之间的差异大于low和upp给出的阈值。

trans-unit.source: If the rank of X is known it can be specified as r – no check is made to ensure that this really is the rank of X.
trans-unit.target: 如果知道X的等级，可以将其指定为r –不会检查以确保它确实是X的等级。

trans-unit.source: If the regression_coefficients are included in the state vector, the recursive estimates are available in the results class in the regression_coefficients attribute.
trans-unit.target: 如果状态向量中包含regression_coefficients，则在 regression_coefficients 属性的结果类中可以使用递归估计。

trans-unit.source: If the seasonal effect is stochastic, then there is one additional parameter to estimate via MLE (the variance of the error term).
trans-unit.target: 如果季节性效应是随机的,那么还有一个额外的参数要通过MLE来估计(误差项的方差)。

trans-unit.source: If the two series are almost perfectly collinear, then computing the test is numerically unstable. However, the two series will be cointegrated under the maintained assumption that they are integrated. In this case the t-statistic will be set to -inf and the pvalue to zero.
trans-unit.target: 如果两个序列几乎是完全一致的,那么计算测试在数值上是不稳定的。然而,在保持两个序列是积分的假设下,这两个序列将被共积分,在这种情况下,t统计量将被设置为-inf,p值为零。在这种情况下,t统计量将被设置为-inf,p值为零。

trans-unit.source: If the variance component is intended to produce random intercepts for disjoint subsets of a group, specified by string labels or a categorical data value, always use ‘0 +’ in the formula so that no overall intercept is included.
trans-unit.target: 如果方差成分旨在为由字符串标签或分类数据值指定的组的不相交子集产生随机截距，请在公式中始终使用“ 0 +”，以便不包括总截距。

trans-unit.source: If the variance components specify random slopes and you do not also want a random group-level intercept in the model, then use ‘0 +’ in the formula to exclude the intercept.
trans-unit.target: 如果方差分量指定了随机斜率，并且您也不希望模型中出现随机的组级截距，则在公式中使用“ 0 +”以排除截距。

trans-unit.source: If the weights are a function of the data, then the post estimation statistics such as fvalue and mse_model might not be correct, as the package does not yet support no-constant regression.
trans-unit.target: 如果权重是数据的函数,那么fvalue和mse_model等估计后统计可能不正确,因为该软件包还不支持无常数回归。

trans-unit.source: If there are ties, then then the test statistic and p-value that is reported, is based on the higher p-value between sorting all tied observations of the same group
trans-unit.target: 如果存在并列关系,那么报告的检验统计量和p值,是根据对同组所有并列观测值进行排序后的较高p值计算的

trans-unit.source: If there is an offset or exposure, it should be added to lin_pred prior to calling this function.
trans-unit.target: 如果存在偏移或曝光，则应在调用此函数之前将其添加到 lin_pred 。

trans-unit.source: If there is prior information on the fraction of true hypothesis, then alpha should be set to alpha * m/m_0 where m is the number of tests, given by the p-values, and m_0 is an estimate of the true hypothesis. (see Benjamini, Krieger and Yekuteli)
trans-unit.target: 如果有关于真假说的分数的事先信息,那么α应该设置为α*m/m_0,其中m是测试次数,由p值给出,m_0是真假说的估计值。(见Benjamini、Krieger和Yekuteli)

trans-unit.source: If this flag is set, symmetry of the predicted state covariance matrix is enforced at each iteration of the filter, where each element is set to the average of the corresponding elements in the upper and lower triangle.
trans-unit.target: 如果设置该标志,则在滤波器的每次迭代时都会强制执行预测状态协方差矩阵的对称性,其中每个元素被设置为上下三角形中相应元素的平均值。

trans-unit.source: If this function is called with the time series (isacov=False), then the sample autocovariance function is calculated with the default options (biased, no fft).
trans-unit.target: 如果在调用该函数时使用时间序列(isacov=False),则使用默认选项(有偏差,无ft)计算样本自方差函数。

trans-unit.source: If unbiased is true, the denominator for the autocovariance is adjusted but the autocorrelation is not an unbiased estimtor.
trans-unit.target: 如果无偏为真,则调整自变量的分母,但自相关不是无偏估计器。

trans-unit.source: If we generate artificial data with smaller group effects, the T test can no longer reject the Null hypothesis:
trans-unit.target: 如果我们生成的人工数据具有较小的群体效应,T检验就不能再拒绝Null假设。

trans-unit.source: If we run this in statsmodels LME with defaults, we see that the variance estimate is indeed very small, which leads to a warning about the solution being on the boundary of the parameter space. The regression slopes agree very well with R, but the likelihood value is much higher than that returned by R.
trans-unit.target: 如果我们在statsmodels LME中默认运行,就会发现方差估计确实非常小,这就导致了解在参数空间边界上的警告。回归斜率与R非常一致,但似然值比R返回的要高很多。

trans-unit.source: If weights matrix is given, then the formula use to calculate cov_params depends on whether has_optimal_weights is true. If no weights are given, then the weight matrix is calculated with the given method, and has_optimal_weights is assumed to be true.
trans-unit.target: 如果给定权重矩阵,那么计算cov_params的公式取决于has_optimal_weights是否为真。如果没有给定权重,则用给定的方法计算权重矩阵,并且假设has_optimal_weights为真。

trans-unit.source: If wt and weights are None, then the simple kappa is computed. If wt is given, but weights is None, then the weights are set to be [0, 1, 2, …, k]. If weights is a one-dimensional array, then it is used to construct the weight matrix given the following options.
trans-unit.target: 如果wt和weights为None，则计算简单的kappa。如果给出了wt，但权重为None，则权重设置为[0，1，2，…，k]。如果权重是一维数组，则可以使用以下选项构造权重矩阵。

trans-unit.source: If you are not comfortable with git, we also encourage users to submit their own examples, tutorials or cool statsmodels tricks to the Examples wiki page.
trans-unit.target: 如果您对git不满意，我们还建议用户向“ 示例Wiki”页面提交自己的示例，教程或出色的statsmodels技巧。

trans-unit.source: If you need to modify the labeling and the coloring you can give a function tocreate the labels and one with the graphical properties starting from the key tuple
trans-unit.target: 如果你需要修改标签和颜色,你可以给出一个函数来创建标签和一个从关键元组开始的图形属性的函数

trans-unit.source: If you want to accomplish the same without opening up the SDK CMD SHELL, then you can use these commands at the CMD Prompt or in a batch file.:

trans-unit.source: In Wikipedia terminology, rows are blocks and columns are treatments. The number of rows N, should be large for the chisquare distribution to be a good approximation.
trans-unit.target: 在维基百科的术语中,行是块,列是处理。行数N,应该是大的,这样才能使chisquare分布成为一个好的近似值。

trans-unit.source: In Wikipedia terminology, rows are blocks and columns are treatments. The number of rows N, should be large for the chisquare distribution to be a good approximation. The Null hypothesis of the test is that all treatments have the same effect.
trans-unit.target: 在维基百科的术语中,行是块,列是处理。行数N,应该大,这样才能很好地近似于chisquare分布。检验的Null假设是所有的处理都有相同的效果。

trans-unit.source: In \(D^{co}_{t-1}\) we have the deterministic terms which are inside the cointegration relation (or restricted to the cointegration relation). \(\eta\) is the corresponding estimator. To pass a deterministic term inside the cointegration relation, we can use the exog_coint argument. For the two special cases of an intercept and a linear trend there exists a simpler way to declare these terms: we can pass "ci" and "li" respectively to the deterministic argument. So for an intercept inside the cointegration relation we can either pass "ci" as deterministic or np.ones(len(data)) as exog_coint if data is passed as the endog argument. This ensures that \(D_{t-1}^{co} = 1\) for all \(t\).
trans-unit.target: 在\（D ^ {co} _ {t-1} \）中，我们具有位于协整关系内（或仅限于协整关系）的确定性项。 \（\ eta \）是相应的估计量。要在协整关系中传递确定性术语，我们可以使用 exog_coint 参数。对于截距和线性趋势这两种特殊情况，存在一种更简单的方式来声明这些术语：我们可以将 "ci" 和 "li" 分别传递给 deterministic 参数。因此，对于协整关系内的截距我们可以通过 "ci" 为 deterministic 或 np.ones(len(data)) 作为 exog_coint 如果 data 作为 endog 参数传递。这样可以确保所有\（t \）的\（D_ {t-1} ^ {co} = 1 \）。

trans-unit.target: 在以前的版本statsmodels 0.4中,α是置信度,例如0.95。

trans-unit.source: In all cases, the data is at the monthly frequency and has been seasonally adjusted; the time-frame considered is 1972 - 2005.

trans-unit.source: In an influential article, Harvey and Jaeger (1993) described the use of unobserved components models (also known as "structural time series models") to derive stylized facts of the business cycle.
trans-unit.target: 在一篇颇具影响力的文章中,Harvey和Jaeger(1993)描述了使用无观测成分模型(也称为 "结构性时间序列模型")来推导商业周期的风格化事实。

trans-unit.source: In backward difference coding, the mean of the dependent variable for a level is compared with the mean of the dependent variable for the prior level. This type of coding may be useful for a nominal or an ordinal variable.
trans-unit.target: 在后向差异编码中,一个级别的因变量的平均值与前一个级别的因变量的平均值进行比较。这种类型的编码可能对名义变量或序数变量有用。

trans-unit.source: In case of a VECM the shown lags are lagged differences.
trans-unit.target: 在VECM的情况下,所显示的滞后是滞后差异。

trans-unit.source: In case of a point forecast: each row of the returned ndarray represents the forecast of the neqs variables for a specific period. The first row (index [0]) is the forecast for the next period, the last row (index [steps-1]) is the steps-periods-ahead- forecast.
trans-unit.target: 在点预测的情况下:返回的ndarray中的每一行都代表neqs变量在特定时期的预测。第一行(索引[0])是下一个时期的预测,最后一行(索引[step-1])是未来时期的预测。

trans-unit.source: In econometrics and statistics the terms are defined more formally, and different definitions of exogeneity (weak, strong, strict) are used depending on the model. The usage in statsmodels as variable names cannot always be interpreted in a formal sense, but tries to follow the same principle.
trans-unit.target: 在计量经济学和统计学中,这些术语的定义比较正式,根据模型的不同,使用了不同的外生性定义(弱、强、严格)。在统计学模型中,作为变量名称的用法不能总是在形式上解释,但尽量遵循同一原则。

trans-unit.source: In essense, what is done is to reconstruct the mean of the (differenced) factor. We will compare it to the coincident index on published by the Federal Reserve Bank of Philadelphia (USPHCI on FRED).
trans-unit.target: 从本质上讲,所做的是重建(差分)因子的平均值。我们将把它与费城联邦储备银行公布的巧合指数进行比较(USPHCI on FRED)。

trans-unit.source: In fact, the dummy coding is not technically a contrast coding. This is because the dummy variables add to one and are not functionally independent of the model’s intercept. On the other hand, a set of contrasts for a categorical variable with k levels is a set of k-1 functionally independent linear combinations of the factor level means that are also independent of the sum of the dummy variables. The dummy coding isn’t wrong per se. It captures all of the coefficients, but it complicates matters when the model assumes independence of the coefficients such as in ANOVA. Linear regression models do not assume independence of the coefficients and thus dummy coding is often the only coding that is taught in this context.
trans-unit.target: 实际上，伪编码在技术上不是对比度编码。这是因为伪变量加一，并且在功能上不独立于模型的截距。另一方面，具有 k 个级别的分类变量的一组对比是一组 k-1 个功能独立的因子级别均值线性组合，它们也独立于虚拟变量的总和。虚拟编码本身并没有错。它捕获了所有系数，但是当模型假设系数独立时（例如在ANOVA中），事情就变得复杂了。线性回归模型没有假设系数的独立性，因此在这种情况下，通常仅采用虚拟编码。

trans-unit.source: In fact, the dummy coding is not technically a contrast coding. This is because the dummy variables add to one and are not functionally independent of the model's intercept. On the other hand, a set of contrasts for a categorical variable with k levels is a set of k-1 functionally independent linear combinations of the factor level means that are also independent of the sum of the dummy variables. The dummy coding isn't wrong per se. It captures all of the coefficients, but it complicates matters when the model assumes independence of the coefficients such as in ANOVA. Linear regression models do not assume independence of the coefficients and thus dummy coding is often the only coding that is taught in this context.
trans-unit.target: 实际上，伪编码在技术上不是对比度编码。这是因为伪变量加一，并且在功能上不独立于模型的截距。另一方面，具有 k 个级别的分类变量的一组对比是一组 k-1 个功能独立的因子级别均值线性组合，它们也独立于虚拟变量的总和。虚拟编码本身并没有错。它捕获了所有系数，但是当模型假设系数独立时（例如在ANOVA中），事情就变得复杂了。线性回归模型没有假设系数的独立性，因此在这种情况下，通常仅采用虚拟编码。

trans-unit.source: In general we may consider DBETAS in absolute value greater than $2/\sqrt{N}$ to be influential observations
trans-unit.target: 一般情况下,我们可以认为DBETAS的绝对值大于2元//sqrt{N}元,是有影响的观测值。

trans-unit.source: In many cases of statistical analysis, we are not sure whether our statistical model is correctly specified. For example when using ols, then linearity and homoscedasticity are assumed, some test statistics additionally assume that the errors are normally distributed or that we have a large sample. Since our results depend on these statistical assumptions, the results are only correct of our assumptions hold (at least approximately).
trans-unit.target: 在很多统计分析的情况下,我们不能确定我们的统计模型是否正确指定。例如当使用OLS时,那么就会假设线性和同质性,一些检验统计还假设误差是正态分布的,或者我们有一个大样本。由于我们的结果依赖于这些统计假设,所以只有我们的假设成立(至少是近似),结果才是正确的。

trans-unit.source: In models with many variables and factors, this can sometimes lend interpretation to the factors (for example sometimes one factor will load primarily on real variables and another on nominal variables).
trans-unit.target: 在有许多变量和因子的模型中,这有时会给因子带来解释(例如有时一个因子会主要加载在实际变量上,而另一个则加载在名义变量上)。

trans-unit.source: In models with more variables and more factors, this can sometimes lend interpretation to the factors (for example sometimes one factor will load primarily on real variables and another on nominal variables).
trans-unit.target: 在有更多变量和更多因子的模型中,这有时会给因子带来解释(例如有时一个因子会主要加载在实际变量上,另一个因子加载在名义变量上)。

trans-unit.source: In most cases, the quantile regression point estimates lie outside the OLS confidence interval, which suggests that the effect of income on food expenditure may not be constant across the distribution.
trans-unit.target: 在大多数情况下,分位数回归点估计值位于OLS置信区间之外,这表明收入对食品支出的影响在整个分布中可能不是恒定的。

trans-unit.source: In order for \(C(L)\) to be invertible, it must be that each factor \((1 - \lambda_i L)\) is invertible; the condition is then that \(|\lambda_i| < 1\), where \(\lambda_i\) is a root of the polynomial.
trans-unit.target: 为了使\（C（L）\）是可逆的，必须使每个因子\（（1- -lambda_i L）\）是可逆的；那么条件是\（| \ lambda_i | <1 \），其中\（\ lambda_i \）是多项式的根。

trans-unit.source: In order to achieve cycles with the appropriate frequencies, bounds are imposed on the parameter \(\lambda_c\) in estimation. These can be controlled via the keyword argument cycle_period_bounds, which, if specified, must be a tuple of bounds on the period(lower, upper). The bounds on the frequency are then calculated from those bounds.
trans-unit.target: 为了获得具有适当频率的周期，在估计中将边界施加到参数\（\ lambda_c \）上。这些可以通过关键字参数 cycle_period_bounds 进行控制，如果指定了参数，则必须为句点 (lower, upper) 的边界元组。然后从这些边界计算出频率的边界。

trans-unit.source: In other words, y is endogenous to our model, x is exogenous to our model for the estimation.
trans-unit.target: 换句话说，y 对我们的模型是内生的，x 对我们的模型是外生的。

trans-unit.source: In particular, they make the argument that these goals are often better met using the unobserved components approach rather than the popular Hodrick-Prescott filter or Box-Jenkins ARIMA modeling techniques.
trans-unit.target: 特别是,他们提出了这样的论点,即使用无观测成分方法而不是流行的Hodrick-Prescott过滤器或Box-Jenkins ARIMA建模技术,往往能更好地满足这些目标。

trans-unit.source: In small samples the power for the discrete version, has a sawtooth pattern as a function of the number of observations. As a consequence, small changes in the number of observations or in the normal approximation can have a large effect on the power.
trans-unit.target: 在小样本中， discrete 版本的功效具有锯齿形，它是观察次数的函数。结果，观测次数或法线近似值的微小变化会对功效产生很大影响。

trans-unit.source: In some cases, the maximum likelihood estimator might not exist, parameters might be infinite or not unique (e.g. (quasi-)separation in models with binary endogenous variable). Under the default settings, statsmodels will print a warning if the optimization algorithm stops without reaching convergence. However, it is important to know that the convergence criteria may sometimes falsely indicate convergence (e.g. if the value of the objective function converged but not the parameters). In general, a user needs to verify convergence.
trans-unit.target: 在某些情况下,最大似然估计器可能不存在,参数可能是无限的,或者不是唯一的(例如,在有二元内生变量的模型中(准)分离)。在默认设置下,如果优化算法没有达到收敛,statsmodels会打印一个警告。然而,要知道,收敛标准有时可能会错误地表明收敛(例如,如果目标函数的值收敛了,但参数没有收敛)。一般来说,用户需要验证收敛性。

trans-unit.target: 在Gram-Charlier分布中,密度有可能变成负数。当与正态分布的偏差过大时,就会出现这种情况。

trans-unit.source: In the above models we have assumed that the transition probabilities are constant across time. Here we allow the probabilities to change with the state of the economy. Otherwise, the model is the same Markov autoregression of Hamilton (1989).
trans-unit.target: 在上述模型中,我们假设过渡概率在不同时间段是不变的。在这里,我们允许概率随着经济状况的变化而变化。否则,模型就是汉密尔顿(1989)的相同的马尔科夫自回归模型。

trans-unit.source: In the case of missing data, the maintained hypothesis is that the data are missing completely at random. This test is then run on the standardized residuals excluding those corresponding to missing observations.
trans-unit.target: 在数据缺失的情况下,维持的假设是数据完全随机缺失。然后对标准化残差进行这一检验,排除与缺失观测值相对应的残差。

trans-unit.source: In the case of two samples, the samples are assumed to be independent.

trans-unit.source: In the multinomial logit model. .. math:: frac{expleft(beta_{j}^{prime}x_{i}right)}{sum_{k=0}^{J}expleft(beta_{k}^{prime}x_{i}right)}
In the multinomial model the score matrix is K x J-1 but is returned as a flattened array to work with the solvers.
trans-unit.target: 在多项式模型中,得分矩阵为K×J-1,但以扁平化数组形式返回,以便与求解器配合使用。

trans-unit.source: In the multinomial model the score vector is K x (J-1) but is returned as a flattened array. The Jacobian has the observations in rows and the flatteded array of derivatives in columns.
trans-unit.target: 在多项式模型中,得分向量是K x (J-1),但返回的是一个扁平化数组。雅各布的观测值在行,导数的扁平化数组在列。

trans-unit.source: In the notation of [1], the arguments (variance, unconstrained) are written as \((\Sigma, A_1, \dots, A_p)\), where \(p\) is the order of the vector autoregression, and is here determined by the length of the unconstrained argument.
trans-unit.target: 在[1]的表示法中，参数 (variance, unconstrained) 写为\（（\ Sigma，A_1，\ dots，A_p）\），其中\（p \）是向量自回归的顺序，并且这里由 unconstrained 参数的长度确定。

trans-unit.source: In the one and two sample cases with two-sided alternative, this test produces the same p-value as proportions_chisquare, since the chisquare is the distribution of the square of a standard normal distribution.
trans-unit.target: 在具有两面交替的一个和两个样本案例中，此测试产生与 proportions_chisquare s_chisquare 相同的p值，因为卡方是标准正态分布的平方的分布。

trans-unit.source: In the previous example, we included a seasonal effect in an additive way, meaning that we added a term allowing the process to depend on the 4th MA lag. It may be instead that we want to model a seasonal effect in a multiplicative way. We often write the model then as an ARIMA $(p,d,q) \times (P,D,Q)_s$, where the lowercast letters indicate the specification for the non-seasonal component, and the uppercase letters indicate the specification for the seasonal component; $s$ is the periodicity of the seasons (e.g. it is often 4 for quarterly data or 12 for monthly data). The data process can be written generically as:
trans-unit.target: 在前面的示例中，我们以加法方式包括了季节性影响，这意味着我们添加了一个术语，使过程取决于第四次MA延迟。取而代之的是，我们希望以乘积的方式来模拟季节效应。我们通常将模型写成ARIMA $（p，d，q）\ times（P，D，Q）_s $，其中小写字母表示非季节性组件的规格，大写字母表示规格对于季节性成分；$ s $是季节的周期性（例如，季度数据通常为4，月度数据通常为12）。数据过程可以一般写为：

trans-unit.target: 在最简单的形式中,模型将一个观测变量y与另一组变量x以某种线性或非线性形式联系起来。

trans-unit.target: 在这种情况下,预计经济衰退将持续一年左右(4个季度),经济扩张将持续两年半左右。

trans-unit.source: In this case, the AR order is specified via the autoregressive keyword, and the autoregressive coefficients are estimated.
trans-unit.target: 在这种情况下，可通过 autoregressive 关键字指定AR顺序，并估算自回归系数。

trans-unit.source: In this case, the autoregressive parameters would also be estimated via MLE.
trans-unit.target: 在这种情况下,自回归参数也将通过MLE进行估计。

trans-unit.source: In this example we just reuse the same correlation matrix several times. Of course in reality one would show a different correlation (measuring a another type of correlation, for example Pearson (linear) and Spearman, Kendall (nonlinear) correlations) for the same variables.
trans-unit.target: 在这个例子中,我们只是多次重复使用同一个相关矩阵。当然在现实中,人们会对相同的变量显示不同的相关性(测量另一种类型的相关性,例如皮尔逊(线性)和Spearman、Kendall(非线性)相关性)。

trans-unit.source: In this example, w is the standard deviation of the error. WLS requires that the weights are proportional to the inverse of the error variance.
trans-unit.target: 在此示例中， w 是误差的标准偏差。 WLS 要求权重与误差方差的倒数成正比。

trans-unit.source: In this example, we will vizualize the interaction between categorical factors. First, we will create some categorical data are initialized. Then plotted using the interaction_plot function which internally recodes the x-factor categories to ingegers.
trans-unit.target: 在这个例子中,我们将vizualize分类因素之间的互动。首先,我们将创建一些分类数据进行初始化。然后使用interaction_plot函数进行绘制,该函数内部将x因子类别重新编码为ingegers。

trans-unit.source: In this implementation of differenced models, the Hamilton representation is not able to accomodate differencing in the state vector, so simple_differencing (which performs differencing prior to estimation so that the first d + sD observations are lost) must be used.
trans-unit.target: 在这种差分模型的实现中，汉密尔顿表示 simple_differencing 状态向量中的差分，因此必须使用simple_differencing（在估计之前执行差分，从而丢失第一个d + sD观测值）。

trans-unit.source: In this model, with only four endogenous variables and one factor, it is easy to digest a simple table of the $R^2$ values, but in larger models it is not. For this reason, a bar plot is often employed; from the plot we can easily see that the factor explains most of the variation in industrial production index and a large portion of the variation in sales and employment, it is less helpful in explaining income.
trans-unit.target: 在这个模型中,只有四个内生变量和一个因子,很容易消化一个简单的$R^2$值表,但在更大的模型中就不容易了。为此,经常采用柱状图,从图中我们很容易看出,该因素解释了工业生产指数的大部分变化,也解释了销售和就业的大部分变化,它对解释收入的帮助较小。

trans-unit.source: In this part we develop models and functions that will be useful for time series analysis. Most of the models and function have been moved to statsmodels.tsa. Currently, GARCH models remain in development stage in sandbox.tsa.
trans-unit.target: 在这一部分中，我们将开发对时间序列分析有用的模型和函数。大多数模型和功能已移至 statsmodels.tsa 。目前，GARCH模型仍在 sandbox.tsa 中处于开发阶段。

trans-unit.source: In this plot, if some points are adjacent (similar components), it means that back in the original space, the curves are similar. Then, finding the median curve means finding the higher density region (HDR) in the reduced space. Moreover, the more you get away from this HDR, the more the curve is unlikely to be similar to the other curves.
trans-unit.target: 在这个图中,如果有些点是相邻的(相似的分量),就意味着回到原始空间,曲线是相似的。那么,找到中值曲线就意味着找到了缩小空间中的高密度区域(HDR)。而且,离这个HDR越远,曲线就越不可能与其他曲线相似。
